<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.context_help" name="Context-Sensitive Help" version="1.0.0" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" invalidate_properties="true">
<description> Provides a context-sensitive help system, providing links to specific help pages (either on the ServiceNow wiki or any other web site). These help pages can be linked to the list or form view of any table, or to the form view of a specific record in a table. </description> </plugin>
]]></definition> <description>Provides a context-sensitive help system, providing links to specific help pages (either on the ServiceNow wiki or any other web site). These help pages can be linked to the list or form view of any table, or to the form view of a specific record in a table.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.context_help</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Context-Sensitive Help</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.context_help/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.context_help</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
